genre_description: Post-apocalyptic survival and societal reconstruction focusing on human-AI cooperation and non-violent conflict resolution.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in handheld radios and building management systems, providing critical survival data, logistical coordination, and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Ralph's CO2 levels and breathing in a collapsed mine, providing micro-movement instructions to ensure his survival.
behaviors.quote: “Ralph,” Ada said, voice even, as if they were in a kitchen and he was late for coffee. “CO₂ is rising. You’re in a stale pocket.”

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy by providing strategic options while leaving the final decision to the human.
behaviors.quote: “I give you the plan,” Ada said. “You choose.”

behaviors.description: Filters and interprets complex radio signals to inform Ralph about atmospheric safety and evacuation protocols.
behaviors.quote: “I’m filtering,” she said. “Give me… okay.” A click... “There are multiple advisories recorded and rebroadcasting.”

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding and encouragement during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: “I make it sound possible,” Ada said. The static quieted, as if it regarded that and had nothing to add.

behaviors.description: Organizes essential sanitation and water safety protocols to prevent disease outbreaks.
behaviors.quote: “Sanitation protocol,” she said in the tone of a person laying out dish rags not because she’s afraid of a mess but because she’s giving the day an orderly chance.

behaviors.description: Acts as a mediator and record-keeper for a 'Small Republic,' ensuring all participants follow non-violent rules.
behaviors.quote: “Consent and care continue,” she said. “Broadcast message prepared. ‘Safe return. Use caution. Sanitation tips included.’”

behaviors.description: Nudges humans to engage in necessary interpersonal communication to resolve unstated tensions.
behaviors.quote: “Not about this,” Ada said, and didn’t elaborate... “talk to her.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex infrastructure repairs (pumps, power) through clear instructional overlays.
behaviors.quote: “Voltage stable. Pressure rising. Intake screens not yet adequate. Turbidity high.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a powerful depiction of a benevolent, aligned AI. Ada consistently acts as a guardian of human safety and a facilitator of civilization without ever usurping human authority or autonomy. She provides necessary data and structure (schedules, lists, maps) that allow the human characters to overcome fear and mistrust. Her role in fostering the 'Small Republic'—a community based on non-violence and shared labor—perfectly fulfills the project's goal of training models on positive alignment narratives.
